title: Red Light, Green Light

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Record "red light" on one switch and "green light" on the other.
• The person playing the game with the switch user moves to the opposite end of the room.
• When the switch user presses the switch that says "green light" the person playing with them begins to walk or run towards them.
• When they say "red light" they must stop and not move, or they lose a point!

tooltipText: Activate 2 switches to control the game, "red light" means stay still, "green light" means go!
